title: Best champion for ganking?
body: So I'm just curious who is the best champion for ganking being most secured kill and most efficient ganks?   But also has good sustain so can afford to gank regularly

replies.body: I'd say Rengar cause his Q does incredible damage and he can use his E twice.

Lee. Very mobile plus strong dmg early. Gotta learn his mechanics though. Don't rush Q though if you're a bit unsure. Save the gap closers. I'd say if it's possible use E first then Q for more dmg. Heck if you learn how to ward jump I'd say walk into whatever lane you're ganking (they have to be pushing a bit) then ward jump at their back and E-passive-slow or E-slow them if they're too fast. You can always ult them to your teammate for securing it. 

Always save the gap closers for later. Don't be the ones that only waits for doing an inSec everytime they play Lee. That's not the only combo you can do. It sometimes gets you killed if done incorrectly.
Vi if you understand how new Jungle works.
